thread.title: Gusty winds create challenges on Day 5 of Carolina Forest wildfire
thread.title_full: Gusty winds create challenges on Day 5 of Carolina Forest wildfire

author: @wmbfnews
title: Gusty winds create challenges on Day 5 of Carolina Forest wildfire
text:
Updated: 5 hours ago
Today is a FIRST ALERT WEATHER DAY for the potential of strong-severe storms capable of isolated tornadoes as well as strong to damaging winds at times through the day.
Updated: 5 hours ago
The Florence County Sheriffâ€™s Office is investigating and searching for two persons of interest after a car theft.
Updated: 5 hours ago
Strong winds in Horry County on Wednesday presented new challenges as the massive wildfire in Carolina Forest continues to burn.
Updated: 5 hours ago
Authorities in the Pee Dee are investigating a pair of recent weekend shootings that each left a person hurt.
Updated: 5 hours ago
Strong winds are coming to the Grand Strand as the massive wildfire in Carolina Forest continues to burn.
Updated: 5 hours ago
The threat of severe storms has come to an end.
